title: Educational Innovation Diffusion Strategy Through Autonomous Educational Space Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A program for in-service professionals exploring the balance between autonomy and system support under central-local cooperation frameworks, providing realistic decision-making experiences via smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: One can analyze and explain education innovation diffusion mechanisms under centralized-decentralized systems
One can design structural and social support strategies to strengthen school autonomy
One can build knowledge-sharing systems through middle-management roles and measure diffusion effects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
